Title: ‘Good news on SCS by month-end’
Content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is in favour of granting Special Category Status and special package to the State, and good news is likely by this month-end, TDP Central Disciplinary Committee member Som
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is in favour of granting Special Category Status and special package to the State, and good news is likely by this month-end, TDP Central Disciplinary Committee member Som
